reviewText: Great okd movie - loved Fred and Ginger again.

I loved the Bway version of Silk Stockings but it was never recorded to vhs so I got the Astaire/Charisse version on cd and it was very good.  What's not to like with those two dancing and singing along with Peter Lorre as a Russian courier.  The other two movies were also excellent. If you like Astaire, this should be a must for your collection.
Always a delight to see Astaire dance.  The last time Astaire & Rogers did a movie together (Barkleys)had the romantic song "They Can't Take That Away From Me".  How fitting!
